extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.beats.ListenBeats
extension.description: Listens for messages sent by libbeat compatible clients (e.g. filebeats, metricbeats, etc) using Libbeat's 'output.logstash', writing its JSON formatted payload to the content of a FlowFile.This processor replaces the now deprecated ListenLumberjack

property.name: Local Network Interface
property.description: The name of a local network interface to be used to restrict listening to a specific LAN.

property.name: Port
property.description: The port to listen on for communication.

property.name: Receive Buffer Size
property.description: The size of each buffer used to receive messages. Adjust this value appropriately based on the expected size of the incoming messages.

property.name: Max Size of Message Queue
property.description: The maximum size of the internal queue used to buffer messages being transferred from the underlying channel to the processor. Setting this value higher allows more messages to be buffered in memory during surges of incoming messages, but increases the total memory used by the processor.

property.name: Max Size of Socket Buffer
property.description: The maximum size of the socket buffer that should be used. This is a suggestion to the Operating System to indicate how big the socket buffer should be. If this value is set too low, the buffer may fill up before the data can be read, and incoming data will be dropped.

property.name: Character Set
property.description: Specifies the character set of the received data.

property.name: Max Batch Size
property.description: The maximum number of messages to add to a single FlowFile. If multiple messages are available, they will be concatenated along with the <Message Delimiter> up to this configured maximum number of messages

property.name: Message Delimiter
property.description: Specifies the delimiter to place between messages when multiple messages are bundled together (see <Max Batch Size> property).

property.name: Max Number of TCP Connections
property.description: The maximum number of concurrent TCP connections to accept.

property.name: SSL_CONTEXT_SERVICE
property.description: The Controller Service to use in order to obtain an SSL Context. If this property is set, messages will be received over a secure connection.

property.name: Client Auth
property.description: The client authentication policy to use for the SSL Context. Only used if an SSL Context Service is provided.

relationship.name: success
relationship.description: Messages received successfully will be sent out this relationship.

writesAttribute.name: beats.sender
writesAttribute.description: The sending host of the messages.

writesAttribute.name: beats.port
writesAttribute.description: The sending port the messages were received over.

writesAttribute.name: beats.sequencenumber
writesAttribute.description: The sequence number of the message. Only included if <Batch Size> is 1.

writesAttribute.name: mime.type
writesAttribute.description: The mime.type of the content which is application/json
